Based on your preferences, I would highly recommend the movie "Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them" (2001) directed by David Cronenberg. The movie features an ensemble cast including David Cronenberg himself, Julianne Moore, Ben Kingsley, Ron Perlman, Michael Gambon, Ralph Fiennes, and many more talented actors.
The movie follows the journey of Newt Scamander (David Cronenberg himself), a magizoologist, as he embarks on a worldwide tour to research and rescue magical creatures. The movie also features several magical creatures including Quidditch players, dragons, and other mystical beings that make up Newt Scamander's world.
Overall, "Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them" is an excellent film that features a talented cast, exciting action sequences, and a thrilling storyline that will keep you on the edge of your seat from beginning to end.
